message: Let's split it evenly, no need to negotiate!
You can't fool me with your even split! I'll take 60, you get 40.
You're too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'll give you a 'generous' offer, but don't expect any more!
You're not getting away with all the money, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
